# ChangeLog

## v4.2.1
* NODE-5151: Url support for sandbox env https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5151

## v4.2.0
* Typescript support for urls-ebay, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3683 

## v4.1.0

* CPU optimization, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3655
* Removed sync module load to avoid blocking main thread for 1 second when module is loaded
* Given that the urls are fixed and never change, we do not need to plug then into module-config-inc system
* Upgraded to eslint and nyc

## v4.0.0
* Upgrade module-config-inc that pulls in peer dependency

## v1.0.0
* Adding `getBaseUrl` function to get base ebay url for given siteId in current env
* Updating readme
